casebody.data:
Phyllis TEBAULT, Patricia Delavallade, Almeria Williams, Anthony Jackson, Eileen Jones, Zakiya Jackson, and Doris Monconduit, individually and as Heirs of Thelma Jackson
v.
EAST JEFFERSON GENERAL HOSPITAL, Dr. Arzu Hatipoglugreen, Dr. Rene Deboisblanc and Dr. Christian Scheuermann NO. 2019-CC-0641 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 17, 2019 Denied. WEIMER, J., would grant.

GUIDRY, J., would grant.
